meta.name: Open to It
meta.description: A loving gay couple experiments with becoming a hot gay throuple. But threesome sex and open relationships come with more complications than limbs.

videos.title: Open to Puppet Play
videos.overview: Greg, Cam, Princeton, Elsa and Reggie go to see a (w)holesome puppet show at the theater. Unless...wait. Those puppets look awfully familiar...so does the guy with a fist inside one of the puppets (Princeton's). Will the gang trauma bond?

videos.title: Open to Threesomes
videos.overview: Greg and Cam invite their hot friend Princeton over for their first ever threesome! But will ceviche from lesbian neighbors Elsa and Reggie next door ruin the evening â€“ for one of them?

videos.title: Open to Polyamory
videos.overview: Cam has to go visit his abuela in Vegas, but gives Greg his blessing to enjoy a solo date with Princeton. When Elsa and Reggie knock at the door, curious about who Greg's guest will be, he heads to Princeton's, to avoid further scrutiny. Princeton's home is a pigsty, but I mean, come on: that body.

videos.title: Open to Drag Queen Story Hour
videos.overview: Cam and his drag-family read for drag queen story hour.

videos.title: Open to Body Language
videos.overview: In their search for a regular third, Greg and Cam find Jasper: Princeton's classmate, and a Deaf ASL professor. They get creative in bridging their communication gap. Princeton and Kat bond over pole dancing, Tarot, and Princeton's booty.

videos.title: Open to X-X-Xmas
videos.overview: Cam and Greg host their annual gay Christmas party. But what happens when family members attend, alongside friends from the naughty list?

videos.title: Open to New Queer's Eve
videos.overview: Greg and Cam plan to break the news that they're open to Cam's parents, to ring in the New Year with both honesty, and discomfort. Princeton plans his own double date: him and Kat with Elsa and Reggie. But Kat's girlfriend Olive crashes.

videos.title: Open to Naked Parties
videos.overview: Princeton shrugs off a rejection from Kat - by hosting a naked pool party. Greg and Cam attend, hoping to reconnect. Elsa and Reggie wander in accidentally, but may end up winning the title of party MVP (Most Validating of Princeton).
